meta-review.comment: Ready or Not delivers a realistic and tactical first-person shooter experience, immersing players in the role of a SWAT team member, providing challenging gameplay and intriguing gunplay. The game offers a variety of levels, weapons, and gadgets, along with complex and unpredictable AI enemies, creating a captivating and compelling gameplay experience for those who enjoy strategic decision-making and teamwork. While there are some technical flaws and minor bugs, the game still offers a solid and engaging experience that is worth considering for fans of tactical shooters.
